content: A big milestone with the 'Cultural Lens' project today. Policy suggestions are more culturally sensitive, but fairness and accuracy are still our toughest nuts to crack.
Just pulled another all-nighter to refine Xander's 'Simple Mode'. Real-time policy impacts are now clearer, but we're tweaking it to make sure it's both engaging and informative.

Had an epiphany today - our 'Policy Ledger' could really use some beefing up. We're cooking up features to get users thinking more deeply about what they engage with. It's a journey, but we're making progress, slowly but surely.
